mapper.select: SELECT /* com.plgrim.ncp.base.selectInfGodItm Generator(Generator) 2018-07-12 */ SEQ , BRND_ID , SESON_CD , DSGN_GRP_NO , ERP_GOD_NO , BCODE , GOD_NM , ENG_GOD_NM , RTL_PRC , COLOR_CD , LNDR_CD , OPT_VAL_CD , RECOMEND_SEX_CD , PRDLST_CD , PRDC_SECT_CD , GOD_SECT_CD , ORG_PL_NM , ENG_ORG_PL_NM , MNFCTUR_YM , KC_CRTFC_NO , RELAT_ERP_GOD_NO , FIT_SECT_CD , FIT_DETAIL_SECT_CD , IMPRCOM_NM , TRTMNT_ATND_MATTER_DSCR , CSMR_PRC_TP_CD , REGTR_ID , REG_DT , UDTER_ID , UDT_DT FROM INF_GOD_ITM WHERE 1 = 1
mapper.delete: DELETE /* com.plgrim.ncp.base.deleteInfGodItm Generator(Generator) 2018-07-12 */ FROM INF_GOD_ITM WHERE 1 = 1
